channel.title: 工具 on Freedom Book
channel.description: Recent content in 工具 on Freedom Book

item.description: find ./ -type d -name "Backup" -exec rm -rf {} \; sed -i "s/<cups\/cups.h>/\"cups\/cups.h\"/g" `grep "cups/cups.h" -rl .` find . -type f -size +100M -print0 | xargs -0 du -h | sort -nr cat *.txt | sort | uniq > test #导出svn版本差异 for i in $(svn diff --summarize -r 248:276 svn://192.168.10.200/rootfs/ | awk '{ print $2 }'); do p=$(echo $i | sed -e 's{svn://192.168.10.200/rootfs/{{'); mkdir -p $(dirname $p); svn export $i $p; done #获取awk .
